alert.note: Alert for Keith (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 12:12AM CDT until April 23 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Keith County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 1215 AM MDT. * At 1112 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles north of Lemoyne to near Brule, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Ogallala, Paxton, Brule, Sarben, Lemoyne, Keystone, Roscoe, Kingsley Dam, Eagle Gulch Campground, Nevens, Broganville, Otter Creek Campground, Lake View Campground, Big Bald Hill and Belmar. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 80 and 109. Highway 92 between mile markers 124 and 138. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 112 and 149. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
